      • getIFile

        public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile getIFile(SourceFile aSF,
                                        org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject aProject)
        Actually, there can be multiple links for one source file in Eclipse project. This method returns only one IFile. If you want them all, use projet.ZamiaProjectMap.EclipseProjectFileIterator
